entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-10-05
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • `dotnet publish --os Linux` in .NET 7 references .NET 6 #28350
  • Compilator can't find the matching overload for operator+ when implementing nullability to project #28342
  • Add integration tests for the optional rules in the ValidatePackage and ValidateAssemblies tasks #28337

Closed

  • PublishRelease=true in project file doesn't actually change the configuration to "Release" when running "dotnet publish" #26732
  • [6.0.10x] NuGet version incoherency between sdk and templating #28107
  • dotnet nuget --store-password-in-clear-text options doesn't work on docker #28028

PullRequests

Created

  • normalize accessibility when not including internal symbols #28348
    Area-ApiCompat
  • Baseline Update for 6.0.306 #28346
  • [release/7.0.1xx] Add missing EnableRuleAttributesMustMatch task property #28338
    Servicing-consider, Area-ApiCompat

Merged

  • Enable codeql #28330
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Fix ApiCompatEnableRuleCannotChangeParameterName prop #28344
  • Update windows images #28178
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Add missing EnableRuleAttributesMustMatch task parameter #28336
    Area-ApiCompat

Updated

  • Update branding to 6.0.111 #28322
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [dotnet tool] Add ability to check if a tool is installed #28333
    Area-Tools
  • Add --ucr shorthand for --use-current-runtime #27971
    Area-CLI
  • Add Description to Workload --info #27973
    Area-CLI
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2012663 #27667
  • Add warning when targeting 7.0 in 17.3 and remove 7.0 from the list of supported targets #28224
    Servicing-consider, Area-Infrastructure
  • Switch to 7.0.2xx for loc build #28304
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.1xx' => 'main' #28303
    Area-Infrastructure
  • 8.0 template packages #27486
    Area-Common templates
